page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN MINSTERLEY
page.content: { {THE CREAMERY AT MINSTERLEY.} The creamery at Minsterley makes lots of people happy by providing jobs.They make lots of healthy foods like{butter, cheese, cream and yogurt.The{yogurt}is in all flavours. My favourites are pineapple and strawberry. There are big articulated lorries and tankers. The tankers carry{milk from the farms.Inside the backs of the articulated lorries it is very cold because the food has to be kept extremely cold so that it will not go bad.My dad works at the creamery and he told me that the lorries have to be weighed before they leave the factory with a full load. The factory is lit up at night and looks quite a sight as you pass on the road to Shrewsbury.
